Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR):
오늘은 햇빛이 유독 따가운 날. 창밖을 지나가는
인간의 머리 위에서
무언가 빛났어.
흰 갈매기의 깃털 같은 것.
따라가 보려고 해!
English (United States)(en-US): Today, the sunlight feels particularly harsh. Something was shining on top of a human's head outside the window. I'm going to follow it!

Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR):
‘술래’와 새끼 손가락을
얽고 있던 적 있어? 
난 ‘술래잡기’를 해본 적 없지만, 그런 기분을 알아.
붙잡혀서 영영 벗어날 수 없게 되는 거야.
English (United States)(en-US): Have you ever played Red Light, Green Light? I haven't, but I know how it would feel. Like you would be stuck in the same position, forever.

Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 창밖보다는 안에서 일어나는 일이 궁금한 날이야.\n이곳엔 우리 둘이 있지.\n서로를 바라보는 인간과 괴물.
English (United States)(en-US): Today, I was more curious about what's going on inside, rather than outside. Within these walls, the two of us... A monster and a human.
Did you see it? A great, big, shiny, star-studded band-aid!

Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR):
안 돼. 안 돼. 
사라졌어.
사라져 버렸어. 
나에게 너무나 
소중하던 존재가...
English (United States)(en-US): No. No. Someone so precious to me is now gone. I can't believe it. Help...

Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR):
잠든 인간의 오르락내리락
하는 가슴. 그 위에 누워
귀를 기울이면 심장이 콩콩
뛰고 있어. 온몸이 들썩일 
정도로 세차게.
English (United States)(en-US): A sleeping human's rising and falling chest... If I lie on top of it, I can hear their heart pitter-pattering. So hard that the entire body rocks.
It's coming. I feel it calling me.

Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR):
너를 위한 ‘선물’을 
고민하는 중이야. 
모든 준비가 끝나면 
네 이름을 부를게!
English (United States)(en-US): Thinking of a present for you. When my preparation is complete, I'll call your name!
